register.label: DESIGNED FOR MERE MORTALS
register.title: Send your first document for signing in less than 5 minutes

integration.label: FAST AND SCALABLE API
integration.title: Seamlessly integrate eSignatures into your apps
integration.description: We offer a comprehensive REST API that lets you initiate, track, and fulfill signature requests from within your own applications. Our APIs have been built from the ground up to be scalable to easily handle millions of documents when required.

features.text: At Magicsign, we have over 20 years of experience in building APIs for millions of developers
Average API response time is <200 milliseconds
Support from the same developers who built Magicsign

features.label: BULK LINK OR PUBLIC SIGNING LINK​
features.title: Collect signatures from multiple people with just one link.
features.description: Embed signature URLs on your website or send secure URLs via email to multiple signers. This is perfect for getting documents like account applications, event registrations, and NDAs signed. No coding required: a user-friendly interface. A great alternative to DocuSign’s PowerForms. Start collecting signatures quickly!

features.label: LEGALLY BINDING​
features.title: Legally compliant with U.S. and international laws
features.description: Magicsign is legally compliant with U.S. (ESIGN) and international (eIDAS) eSignature laws. We record all major activities that happen during the signing process and provide a downloadable copy of the complete audit trail report. The final document is also digitally signed so that any tampering in the future can be immediately detected.

features.label: ENTERPRISE-GRADE DATA SECURITY​
features.title: Your data is protected using bank-grade security standards
features.description: We take data security very seriously and have built it into every aspect of the application right from the beginning. All the data stored and transmitted is encrypted using 256-bit AES encryption standards. Your data is completely secure to the point where our own staff do not have access to it even for troubleshooting purposes.

features.label: SECURITY AND COMPLIANCE​
features.title: Certified with SOC 2® and GDPR compliant
features.description: As a company committed to providing secure and trustworthy services to our clients, we are proud to announce that Magicsign is certified with SOC 2® and GDPR compliant. This means that we have implemented strict security measures and data protection protocols to ensure the privacy, confidentiality, and integrity of our clients’ data.
